description:
Orchestrate your farts with the Fart-astic Flatulator! Just cue up the sounds and wait for the laughter. 
    
The Fart-astic Flatulator features nine awesome farts! Included are on-demand classics such as “Cheese Burger,” the “Banana Split” and the “Empty Toilet,” but the Fart-astic Flatulator also allows you to schedule your farts as well! Fool your friends and embarrass your loved ones - choose up to a 60 second delay for each fart. 
    
We're proud to announce a really sweet feature - combo farts! Program the app, put the phone in your pocket, and then walk over to your co-worker's cubical or the teachers desk... imagine the possibilities! Try it out - set your delay to 40 seconds and start off with “Suzies Secret.” Wait a few seconds and then add the “Elefart.” Wait a few more seconds and then finish it off with the “Banana Split." Classic entertainment!
    
The fun won't stop until you're fired or expelled! (We plead the fifth!)

Going on the elevator? Cue up the "Rusty Muffler" and you can be sure everyone will give you your space. Tweeting a twit from the bathroom and need a conversation starter with your stall buddy? Just activate the "Empty Toilet" sound.
    
We could go on and on but we'll leave the rest up to you. Be sure to tell us how you use the Fart-astic Flatulator in the comments.
    
Sure, we know the old saying "whoever denied it supplied it," but we're proud of what we do - and you should be too! We're now accepting fan submissions for our next set of fart sounds. So if you think you can do better, send those farts in! Please email them to ifarted@pjnation.com in WAV or MP3 format. We DON'T want to know how you're recorded them!
